systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

zones.Description: The availability zones of the cluster.

identity.Description: The identity of the cluster, if configured.

etag.Description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

capacity.Description: The number of instances of the cluster.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

principalId.Description: The principal ID of resource identity.

type.Description: The type of managed identity used. The type 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned' includes both an implicitly created identity and a set of user-assigned identities. The type 'None' will remove all identities.

userAssignedIdentities.Description: The list of user identities associated with the Kusto cluster. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

principalId.Description: The principal id of user assigned identity.

clientId.Description: The client id of user assigned identity.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioned state of the resource.

stateReason.Description: The reason for the cluster's current state.

enableDiskEncryption.Description: A boolean value that indicates if the cluster's disks are encrypted.

enableStreamingIngest.Description: A boolean value that indicates if the streaming ingest is enabled.

keyVaultProperties.Description: KeyVault properties for the cluster encryption.

enablePurge.Description: A boolean value that indicates if the purge operations are enabled.

languageExtensions.Description: List of the cluster's language extensions.

enableDoubleEncryption.Description: A boolean value that indicates if double encryption is enabled.

publicNetworkAccess.Description: Public network access to the cluster is enabled by default. When disabled, only private endpoint connection to the cluster is allowed

allowedIpRangeList.Description: The list of ips in the format of CIDR allowed to connect to the cluster.

enableAutoStop.Description: A boolean value that indicates if the cluster could be automatically stopped (due to lack of data or no activity for many days).

restrictOutboundNetworkAccess.Description: Whether or not to restrict outbound network access.  Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'

allowedFqdnList.Description: List of allowed FQDNs(Fully Qualified Domain Name) for egress from Cluster.

version.Description: The version of the template defined, for instance 1.

isEnabled.Description: A boolean value that indicate if the optimized autoscale feature is enabled or not.

enginePublicIpId.Description: Engine service's public IP address resource id.

dataManagementPublicIpId.Description: Data management's service public IP address resource id.

keyName.Description: The name of the key vault key.

keyVersion.Description: The version of the key vault key.

keyVaultUri.Description: The Uri of the key vault.

userIdentity.Description: The user assigned identity (ARM resource id) that has access to the key.

value.Description: GUID or valid URL representing an accepted audience.

principalId.Description: The principal ID assigned to the cluster principal. It can be a user email, application ID, or security group name.

tenantId.Description: The tenant id of the principal

tenantName.Description: The tenant name of the principal

provisioningState.Description: The provisioned state of the resource.
The provisioned state of the resource.

softDeletePeriod.Description: The time the data should be kept before it stops being accessible to queries in TimeSpan.

hotCachePeriod.Description: The time the data should be kept in cache for fast queries in TimeSpan.

leaderClusterResourceId.Description: The name of the leader cluster

attachedDatabaseConfigurationName.Description: The name of the attached database configuration cluster

principalsModificationKind.Description: The principals modification kind of the database

size.Description: The database size - the total size of compressed data and index in bytes.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioned state of the resource.

softDeletePeriod.Description: The time the data should be kept before it stops being accessible to queries in TimeSpan.

hotCachePeriod.Description: The time the data should be kept in cache for fast queries in TimeSpan.

isFollowed.Description: Indicates whether the database is followed.

properties.Description: The properties of the attached database configuration.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioned state of the resource.

databaseName.Description: The name of the database which you would like to attach, use * if you want to follow all current and future databases.

clusterResourceId.Description: The resource id of the cluster where the databases you would like to attach reside.

attachedDatabaseNames.Description: The list of databases from the clusterResourceId which are currently attached to the cluster.

tablesToInclude.Description: List of tables to include in the follower database

tablesToExclude.Description: List of tables to exclude from the follower database

externalTablesToInclude.Description: List of external tables to include in the follower database

externalTablesToExclude.Description: List of external tables exclude from the follower database

materializedViewsToInclude.Description: List of materialized views to include in the follower database

materializedViewsToExclude.Description: List of materialized views exclude from the follower database

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

privateLinkResourceId.Description: The ARM resource ID of the resource for which the managed private endpoint is created.

privateLinkResourceRegion.Description: The region of the resource to which the managed private endpoint is created.

groupId.Description: The groupId in which the managed private endpoint is created.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioned state of the resource.

principalId.Description: The principal ID assigned to the database principal. It can be a user email, application ID, or security group name.

tenantId.Description: The tenant id of the principal

tenantName.Description: The tenant name of the principal

provisioningState.Description: The provisioned state of the resource.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

scriptUrl.Description: The url to the KQL script blob file.

forceUpdateTag.Description: A unique string. If changed the script will be applied again.

continueOnErrors.Description: Flag that indicates whether to continue if one of the command fails.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioned state of the resource.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

privateEndpoint.Description: Private endpoint which the connection belongs to.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.Description: Connection State of the Private Endpoint Connection.

groupId.Description: Group id of the private endpoint.

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning state of the private endpoint.

id.Description: Resource id of the private endpoint.

status.Description: The private link service connection status.

description.Description: The private link service connection description.

actionsRequired.Description: Any action that is required beyond basic workflow (approve/ reject/ disconnect)

properties.Description: The properties of the Event Grid data connection.

kind.Description: Kind of the endpoint for the data connection

storageAccountResourceId.Description: The resource ID of the storage account where the data resides.

eventHubResourceId.Description: The resource ID where the event grid is configured to send events.

tableName.Description: The table where the data should be ingested. Optionally the table information can be added to each message.

mappingRuleName.Description: The mapping rule to be used to ingest the data. Optionally the mapping information can be added to each message.

dataFormat.Description: The data format of the message. Optionally the data format can be added to each message.

ignoreFirstRecord.Description: A Boolean value that, if set to true, indicates that ingestion should ignore the first record of every file

blobStorageEventType.Description: The name of blob storage event type to process.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioned state of the resource.

properties.Description: The Event Hub data connection properties to validate.

kind.Description: Kind of the endpoint for the data connection

eventHubResourceId.Description: The resource ID of the event hub to be used to create a data connection.

tableName.Description: The table where the data should be ingested. Optionally the table information can be added to each message.

mappingRuleName.Description: The mapping rule to be used to ingest the data. Optionally the mapping information can be added to each message.

dataFormat.Description: The data format of the message. Optionally the data format can be added to each message.

eventSystemProperties.Description: System properties of the event hub

compression.Description: The event hub messages compression type

provisioningState.Description: The provisioned state of the resource.

managedIdentityResourceId.Description: The resource ID of a managed identity (system or user assigned) to be used to authenticate with event hub.

properties.Description: The Iot Hub data connection properties.

kind.Description: Kind of the endpoint for the data connection

iotHubResourceId.Description: The resource ID of the Iot hub to be used to create a data connection.

tableName.Description: The table where the data should be ingested. Optionally the table information can be added to each message.

mappingRuleName.Description: The mapping rule to be used to ingest the data. Optionally the mapping information can be added to each message.

dataFormat.Description: The data format of the message. Optionally the data format can be added to each message.

eventSystemProperties.Description: System properties of the iot hub

sharedAccessPolicyName.Description: The name of the share access policy

provisioningState.Description: The provisioned state of the resource.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

groupId.Description: The private link resource group id.

requiredMembers.Description: The private link resource required member names.

requiredZoneNames.Description: The private link resource required zone names.

value.Description: The list of follower database result.

clusterResourceId.Description: Resource id of the cluster that follows a database owned by this cluster.

attachedDatabaseConfigurationName.Description: Resource name of the attached database configuration in the follower cluster.

databaseName.Description: The database name owned by this cluster that was followed. * in case following all databases.

value.Description: The list of Kusto database principals.

appId.Description: Application id - relevant only for application principal type.

tenantName.Description: The tenant name of the principal
